products.name: CHICORI
products.testimonial: I've been feeling pretty stressed with my skin lately, so I picked up a set of CHICORI skincare. Oh my goodness!. It was AMAZING. My skin felt so soft and moisturized
products.description: Infused with the power of nature, NOTORIOUS is a gentle yet effective cleanser that purifies and replenishes your skin. Formulated with antioxidant-rich Green Tea, moisture-boosting Aloe Vera, and calming Chamomile, it effortlessly lifts away impurities and makeup while maintaining your skin's natural balance. Enriched with nutrient-dense Jojoba Oil and a blend of soothing plant extracts, it nourishes and strengthens your skin barrier, leaving your complexion feeling soft, refreshed, and radiant. Treat your skin to the care it deserves—pure, botanical hydration in every wash!
